## Transcript

WEBVTT

01:10.800 --> 01:13.920
<v Speaker>Audible alerts can be turned on or off for these systems.
01:15.040 --> 01:18.800
<v Speaker>And the traffic sign recognition system can be turned on or off.
01:19.520 --> 01:25.360
<v Speaker>The Acura Watch suite of safety and driver assistive technologies are as innovative as they are effective.

learningObjectives: Explore options for turning audible alerts on or off.
Learn about the functionality of the traffic sign recognition system.
questionsAsked: Which systems offer audible alerts that can be turned on or off?
How can you manage the traffic sign recognition system settings?
fields.summary: Audible alerts can be customized for various systems, and the traffic sign recognition system can be activated or deactivated.
